questions.question: What is your company's name and what is its one-line tagline?
What is the primary problem, need, or opportunity your company addresses?
Who is your primary target audience or customer segment?
What are the current alternatives or solutions your target audience uses?
What are the key features of your product/service? How do you want customers to percieve your product/service?
What is the Total Addressable Market (TAM), Serviceable Available Market (SAM) and Serviceable Obtainable Market (SOM), CAGR for your solution?
What is your current monthly revenue?
How many active customers do you have?
Do you have any pilot programs or key partnerships?
What is your user growth rate month-over-month?
Who are the founders of your company and what are their backgrounds?
How much money are you raising?
How much money are you raising?
How will you use the funds?
